name: Wellness Clinic
description: At Rafiki, we welcome everyone who needs care and are dedicated to improving the minds, bodies, and spirits of people of all ages, genders, and backgrounds. We offer a comprehensive range of health and wellness services tailored to San Francisco’s Black and marginalized communities’ unique needs. Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM) is a holistic healing approach that integrates mind, body, and spirit. It recognizes that imbalance can lead to illness and advocates for treating the whole

howToGetIt: How to Book an Appointment To schedule a session, call the CAM Clinic on Mondays after 11 a.m. at 415-615-9945 ext. 107.
address: 601 Cesar Chavez St, San Francisco, CA, 94124
